content: You will next receive a multiple-choice question, each with five options: A, B, C, D, and E respectively. Please provide your answer as a single letter option (your response should contain only one letter as the answer and no other text).

Question: The butt was bare, and Sam couldn't stop staring at it.  It was very what?
Options: A. full B. ample C. covered D. bareword E. ample

The butt was bare and Sam couldn't stop staring at it. It was very ample. Because it was a large and spacious area and ample is a suitable word to describe it. Full and covered are not related to the description of the butt. Bareword is not a suitable word for describing the butt. So, answer is B. ample.

Question: The butt was bare, and Sam couldn't stop staring at it.  It was very what?
Options: A. ample B. bareword C. covered D. ample E. full
根据题干中的描述，答案应该是描述“它”的特点的形容词。根据语境，“它”指的是“裸露的臀部”，因此选项B“bareword”不符合语境。选项C“covered”可以用来描述臀部的一部分，但是不够全面。选项E“full”表示满的，不太符合描述“裸露的臀部”的语境。因此，根据题干描述，答案应该是选项A“ample”，因为它是表示宽阔、宽敞的形容词，符合描述“裸露的臀部”的特点。
